cannon_fire: Heavy, deep boom of a cannon firing a single shot with a low-frequency punch and brief echo
cannon2_fire: Reinforced cannon blast, slightly sharper and more metallic than the basic cannon
cannon3_fire: Advanced high-caliber cannon discharge with a powerful concussive thud and reverb
mg_fire: Short rapid-fire burst of a mounted machine gun, sharp staccato metallic clatter
mg2_fire: Upgraded machine gun burst with a tighter, faster cadence and a slight mechanical whir
mg3_fire: Heavy machine gun rattle, deeper tone with brass casings clinking undertone
missile_fire: Missile launch whoosh with an initial ignition hiss followed by a rising rocket thrust
missile2_fire: Enhanced missile launch with a louder ignition crack and a longer sustained exhaust trail
missile3_fire: Advanced missile roaring out of the launcher with a deep rumble and high-pitched whistle
cannon_hit: Cannon ball impact explosion, a punchy mid-range boom with debris scattering
cannon2_hit: Heavier cannon shell detonation on impact with a sharper crack and dust burst
cannon3_hit: Large-caliber shell exploding on contact with a thunderous low-end boom and shrapnel scatter
mg_hit: Small bullet impact plink, a quick metallic ting against flesh or armor
mg2_hit: Rapid bullet impacts with slightly meatier thuds and small spark sounds
mg3_hit: Heavy round impacts with deeper penetration thuds and brief ricochet whine
missile_hit: Missile explosion on impact, large fiery blast with a booming shockwave
missile2_hit: Bigger missile detonation with extended rumble and crackling fire aftermath
missile3_hit: Massive warhead explosion with a deep earth-shaking boom and prolonged fiery debris
zombie_hit: Fleshy impact thud when a zombie takes damage, wet slap with a brief grunt
zombie_death: Zombie collapsing with bones cracking, a guttural groan fading into silence
zombie_spawn: Eerie rattling of bones assembling, a low growl rising as the skeleton emerges
wave_start: Alert horn sounding the arrival of a new wave, urgent and foreboding
wave_complete: Triumphant short fanfare chime signaling all enemies in the wave are eliminated
life_lost: Ominous low tone with a glass-shattering accent when an enemy reaches the end of the path
tower_place: Solid mechanical clunk of a tower snapping into position on the grid
tower_pickup: Quick metallic scrape as a tower is lifted from its slot
tower_invalid: Short error buzzer indicating an invalid tower placement location
